long_description: fun, engaging, educational, inspiring, interactive and tasty chocolate making workshops in and around cheshire. amanda combines over ten years experience of delivering engaging events and a corporate background with a warm, relaxed and dynamic personality and of course a love of chocolate to deliver various chocolate making workshops, including hen parties, children's parties, corporate events and team building, primary school workshops, plus business and entrepreneurship workshops for schools and colleges. keep it refined to suit all ages or get raunchy - it's up to you. whether you're organising a christmas 'do' or celebration day or are looking for an ice breaker, or a team building exercise i can create a fantastic fun and/or educational workshop to suit your brief. for secondary schools i have a standard entrepreneur challenge workshop or can create a bespoke workshop around business studies learning. available for adults, teens and primary aged children. that was in 2017 and the business has grown from just offering children's parties to hosting much loved hen parties, educational workshops for schools and colleges and corporate events.
